tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE artwork_transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT NOT NULL,
    buyer_id INT NOT NULL,
    seller_id INT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT,
    buyer_id INT,
    seller_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE artwork (
    artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    medium VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    creation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_records (
  transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_id INT NOT NULL,
  buyer_id INT NOT NULL,
  seller_id INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE artwork (
  artwork_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  artist VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_records (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    buyer_id INT,
    seller_id INT,
    artwork_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE artwork (
    artwork_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id INT,
    title TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    token_id UUID UNIQUE,
    creation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE artist (
    artist_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    bio TEXT,
    country TEXT,
    website TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE token (
    token_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id INT,
    token_owner INT,
    token_status VARCHAR(20),
    token_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_id UUID,
    buyer_id UUID,
    seller_id UUID,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE artwork (
    artwork_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id UUID,
    title TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP,
    token_id TEXT
);
